00026 {

00028        return 0;

00033 void install_func (char *name)
00034 {
00035    srnames = (char **) realloc (srnames, (num_sr + 1) * sizeof (char *));
00036    srnames [num_sr] = (char *) calloc (strlen (name) + 1, sizeof (char));
00037    strcpy (srnames [num_sr], name);
00038    num_sr++;
00039 }

00041 char add_srcode (char *name, code_list_t *code)
00042 {
00043    /* form code rem sub routine
00044                 :<name>
00045                 sr code stmts  (in code)
00046                 rem end sub routine
00047                 goto :eof
00048    */
00049    int sr_no = is_func (name);
00050    static int sr_alloced = 0;
00051    code_list_t *labelled_code = new_code_node ();
00052    char beginlabel [80],
00053         *endlabel = beginlabel;
00054 
00055    sprintf (beginlabel, "rem sub routine\n:%s\n", name);
00056    add_string (labelled_code, beginlabel);
00057    code = code_join (2, labelled_code, code);
00058    labelled_code = new_code_node ();
00059    sprintf (endlabel, "rem end sub routine\ngoto :eof\n\n");
00060    add_string (labelled_code, endlabel);
00061    code = code_join (2, code, labelled_code);
00062    if (sr_no != -1)
00063    {
00064       if (sr_no >= sr_alloced)
00065       {
00066          srcode = (code_list_t **) realloc (srcode, \
00067                               (num_sr + 1) * sizeof (code_list_t *));
00068          sr_alloced++;
00069       }
00070       srcode [sr_no] = code;
00071       return 1;
00072    }
00073    return 0;
00074 }
